title: Iain Duncan Smith – 2022 Comments on Conservative Party Unity
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Iain Duncan Smith, the Conservative MP for Chingford, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
If we don’t stop fighting, it will be game over for my regicidal party.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance
  *[
  ESA
 ]: Employment and Support Allowance

The Conservatives need to relearn the virtues of unity. Without it, the next Prime Minister will soon be in familiar trouble.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance
  *[
  ESA
 ]: Employment and Support Allowance
